list.abs: ...摊”，因赌博时先将码子覆于碗下，赌具所有码子被四除去后所余之数，故称“番摊”。旧时有很多“番摊馆”（赌场）（fantan kuan）。另一种就是“麻将牌”（mahjong(g)pai）、“麻雀牌”或“麻雀”（mahjong）（名词）.

means.word_mean: 1. a Chinese gambling game; a random number of counters are placed under a bowl and you gamble on how many will be left (0 or 1 or 2 or 3) modulo 4
2. a card game in which you play your sevens and other cards in sequence in the same suit as their sevens; you win if you are the first to use all your cards
